name: Yumi and Bambi
description:
Yumi and Bambi is a 2D platformer game that allows you to control Bambi in order for him to find her owner Yumi. You can run, crouch, and jump to avoid the obstacles in your way. This game will surely annoy you and test your patience. What are you waiting for? Show your skills now!

This game is originally made for mobile, and will soon be released on Google Play Store.
